messages.content:

Mariella

Mariella, hi! Itâs been so long, many years, since I saw you and Teo last. 

I hope you are well andhealthy and happy. 
I saw a series of beautiful pieces of yours at Poet & the Bench when I visited there last fall. Bonnie and Jeffrey were raving about your character and work. Iâm considering sticking with them & am curious if you recommend working with them. Do they pay on time? Have you had a good experience with them? As a small brand, I have to be careful which baskets to put my eggs in and so Iâm reaching out to ask for your opinion. 

Are you in Bali? Iâd love to see you.

love, Carina .
